languages.text: Неизвестно, что так разъярило вашего зверя, но узнать, что здесь забыл незнакомец, не выйдет — {petname} растерзал жертву до состояния кровавой каши.
It is unclear what so enraged your cyber-mastiff, but there is no way to find out what the stranger was doing here — {petname} has mauled them to a bloody pulp.
languages.original_text: Неизвестно, что так разъярило вашего зверя, но узнать, что здесь забыл незнакомец, не выйдет — {petname} растерзал жертву до состояния кровавой каши.

traits.locale_text: It is unclear what so enraged your pet, but there is no way to find out what the stranger was doing here — {petname} has mauled them to a bloody pulp.

It is unclear what so enraged your cyber-mastiff, but there is no way to find out what the stranger was doing here — {petname} has mauled them to a bloody pulp.
It is unclear what so enraged your cyber-mastiff, but there is no way to find out what the stranger was doing here — {petname} has mauled them to a bloody pulp.

languages.text: 何があなたのペットをそれほど激怒させたのかは不明だが、見知らぬ者がここで何をしていたのかを知る術はない。{petname}が彼らを血まみれの肉の塊にしてしまったからだ。
languages.original_text: It is unclear what so enraged your pet, but there is no way to find out what the stranger was doing here — {petname} has mauled them to a bloody pulp.

traits.locale_text: 何があなたのペットをそれほど激怒させたのかは不明だが、見知らぬ者がここで何をしていたのかを知る術はない。{petname}が彼らを血まみれの肉の塊にしてしまったからだ。

languages.text: Es ist unklar, was deinen Cyber-Mastiff so wütende gemacht hat, aber du kannst nicht mehr herausfinden, was der Fremde hier wollte – {petname} hat ihn zu einem blutigen Haufen zerfleischt.
languages.original_text: It is unclear what so enraged your cyber-mastiff, but there is no way to find out what the stranger was doing here — {petname} has mauled them to a bloody pulp.

traits.locale_text: Es ist unklar, was deinen Cyber-Mastiff so wütende gemacht hat, aber du kannst nicht mehr herausfinden, was der Fremde hier wollte – {petname} hat ihn zu einem blutigen Haufen zerfleischt.
Es ist unklar, was dein Tier so erzürnt hat, aber du kannst nicht mehr herausfinden, was der Fremde hier wollte – {petname} hat ihn zu einem blutigen Haufen zerfleischt.

languages.text: Siber mastifini böylesine öfkelendiren şey belirsiz lakin yabancının burada ne yaptığını artık bilmek imkânsız çünkü {petname}, onu kanlı bir et yığınına çevirmiş.
languages.original_text: It is unclear what so enraged your cyber-mastiff, but there is no way to find out what the stranger was doing here — {petname} has mauled them to a bloody pulp.

traits.locale_text: Siber mastifini böylesine öfkelendiren şey belirsiz lakin yabancının burada ne yaptığını artık bilmek imkânsız çünkü {petname}, onu kanlı bir et yığınına çevirmiş.
Evcil hayvanını böylesine öfkelendiren şey belirsiz lakin yabancının burada ne yaptığını artık bilmek imkânsız çünkü {petname}, onu kanlı bir et yığınına çevirmiş.

languages.text: No sabes lo que ha hecho enfurecer a tu cibermastín, pero tampoco hay forma de averiguar qué hacía aquí el intruso: {petname} lo ha reducido a un guiñapo ensangrentado.
languages.original_text: It is unclear what so enraged your cyber-mastiff, but there is no way to find out what the stranger was doing here — {petname} has mauled them to a bloody pulp.

traits.locale_text: No sabes lo que ha hecho enfurecer a tu cibermastín, pero tampoco hay forma de averiguar qué hacía aquí el intruso: {petname} lo ha reducido a un guiñapo ensangrentado.
No sabes lo que ha hecho enfurecer a tu mascota, pero tampoco hay forma de averiguar qué hacía aquí el intruso: {petname} lo ha reducido a un guiñapo ensangrentado.

languages.text: 你并不清楚你的生化獒犬为什么会被激怒，但你已经无从得知这个人在这里干什么了——{petname}已经把他撕成了鲜血淋漓的碎块。
languages.original_text: It is unclear what so enraged your cyber-mastiff, but there is no way to find out what the stranger was doing here — {petname} has mauled them to a bloody pulp.

traits.locale_text: 你并不清楚你的生化獒犬为什么会被激怒，但你已经无从得知这个人在这里干什么了——{petname}已经把他撕成了鲜血淋漓的碎块。
你并不清楚你的宠物为什么会被激怒，但你已经无从得知这个人在这里干什么了——{petname}已经把他撕成了鲜血淋漓的碎块。

languages.text: Vous ne savez pas ce qui a plongé votre cyber-mastiff dans une telle fureur, mais impossible de questionner l'intrus : {petname} l'a réduit en bouillie.
languages.original_text: It is unclear what so enraged your cyber-mastiff, but there is no way to find out what the stranger was doing here — {petname} has mauled them to a bloody pulp.

traits.locale_text: Vous ne savez pas ce qui a plongé votre cyber-mastiff dans une telle fureur, mais impossible de questionner l'intrus : {petname} l'a réduit en bouillie.
Vous ne savez pas ce qui a plongé votre compagnon dans une telle fureur, mais impossible de questionner l'intrus : {petname} l'a réduit en bouillie.
